languages.text: The first Overseer's attack against an enemy that the {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Roaming{/g} Mastiff attacked before that, is always an auto-crit.

traits.locale_text: The first Overseer's attack against an enemy that the {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Roaming{/g} Mastiff attacked before that, is always an auto-crit.

languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по цели, которую только что успешно атаковал кибермастиф в {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}автономном режиме{/g}, попадание надзирателя является {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpea{/g} a un objetivo justo después de que el cibermastín en {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Modo de combate: A la espera{/g} le haya golpeado también, los ataques del supervisor siempre consiguen un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el supervisor golpea a un objetivo justo después de que el cibermastín en {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Modo de combate: A la espera{/g} le haya golpeado también, los ataques del supervisor siempre consiguen un impacto crítico.

languages.text: 当生化獒犬在{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}战斗模式：自由行动{/g}状态下命中敌人后，如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的攻击也{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}了同一名敌人，则此次攻击必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the same target right after the cyber-mastiff in {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}battle mode: standby{/g} hits it, the Overseer's attacks always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当生化獒犬在{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}战斗模式：自由行动{/g}状态下命中敌人后，如果监察官的攻击也命中了同一名敌人，则此次攻击必定造成暴击。

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} dasselbe Ziel direkt nach dem Cyber-Mastiff im {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Kampfmodus: Bereitschaft{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erzielen die Angriffe des Aufsehers immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the same target right after the cyber-mastiff in {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}battle mode: standby{/g} hits it, the Overseer's attacks always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
